Description: Bowl of marl pottery with incurving rim, red slip with streaky burnish on the interior and red slip carelessly applied to exterior rim, not burnished. Rim uneven, warped.
Curator's comments: Marked '1222 Naqada excavations' on base Like Late ware L16b in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Miss M S Johnston
